name: 360 Degrees Rotation World Runner FREE
description:
You are the hero in this 360 degrees world. Run and jump and don't hit the ground or you lose.

Look at the platforms above your head and see they change the shape and the height.

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.

To jump is easy:
-tap the screen ones for a normal jump
-tap again in the air to jump higher and longer

Features:
-Never ending gameplay
-Extreme addictive
-Suitable for all ages
-Easy to learn and much fun to play
-Fun sounds and music
